the new cryptops you record ended up
being a surprisingly lackluster comeback
it's a whole mess the riffs
don't get me moving at all and the mix

pretty much like white noise meanwhile
with Cannibal Corpse it's pretty much
business as usual 16 albums in and
they're pretty much still sticking with
that same blunt direct brutal formula
you got speed you have the occasional
unhinged crazy lead and lots of thick
distorted riffs and even if it's not new
or exciting per se it does work for them
especially since they do still continue
to sport one of the best vocalists in

feel like the band is kind of going
through the motions at this point and
not just because their last record was

I would expect nothing less from dying

last record in my opinion not to mention

think in comparison with previous

so again with all those bands I've Loved

the record that actually hit for me was

could make a death metal album that

you really feel the roller coaster ride
